alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:53PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tishomingo, eastern Alcorn, southeastern McNairy and Hardin Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 253 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pineflat, or near Pickwick Landing State Park, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Savannah, J P Coleman State Park, Pickwick Landing State Park, Burnsville, Glen, Walnut Grove, Pickwick Dam, Pineflat, Olive Hill, Shiloh, Farmington, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Kossuth, Doskie, Pebble Hill, Strickland and Hamburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.
